AMPS GRIB file metadata

Source: R/raadtools.R
amps_metadata.Rd

GRIB format metadata from the Antarctic Mesoscale Prediction System (AMPS) files.

Format

amps_metadata A data frame with 8 columns. The columns represent

Bandthe band number
GRIB_COMMENTthe data measured
GRIB_ELEMENTthe data name
GRIB_FORECAST_SECONDSforecast seconds
GRIB_REF_TIMEtext reference time
GRIB_SHORT_NAMEshort name
GRIB_UNITtext unit
GRIB_VALID_TIMEtext valid time

Examples

print(amps_metadata)

#> # A tibble: 254 x 8
#>    Band  GRIB_COMMENT          GRIB_ELEMENT GRIB_FORECAST_SECON… GRIB_REF_TIME  
#>    <chr> <chr>                 <chr>        <chr>                <chr>          
#>  1 1     undefined[-]          var176       0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  2 2     undefined[-]          var177       0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  3 3     Icecover(ice          ICEC         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  4 4     Landcover(land        LAND         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  5 5     u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  6 6     u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  7 7     u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  8 8     u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#>  9 9     u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#> 10 10    u-componentofwind[m/… UGRD         0sec                 1445774400secU…
#> # … with 244 more rows, and 3 more variables: GRIB_SHORT_NAME <chr>,
